name: Linux rapidshare grabber
short_description: A Python GUI tool for rapidshare premium member to download rapidshare links. Features: Resumable. Download rapidshare folder/linklist. Multiple concurrent files download / multiple concurrent parts per file. Proxy (HTTP, SOCKS). Urlcash, anonym.to
